core_principles: Content is King: No fluff, no stock photos, no gradients.
Raw Aesthetics: Exposed grids, borders, monospace typography.
Terminal Energy: Command-line vibes, direct language.
High Contrast: Amber/Orange against deep black.

user_choices.theme: Dark Mode Default with Light Mode Toggle

scale.h1: text-5xl md:text-7xl lg:text-9xl font-bold tracking-tighter uppercase leading-[0.9]

rules: Use Space Grotesk for all Headings (H1-H3).
Use Space Mono for Body, Build Logs, Badges, and Navigation.
Headings should be TIGHT (tracking-tighter) and often UPPERCASE.
Body text should have generous line-height.

grid_system.tools_grid: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 border-t border-l border-border
grid_system.bento_grid: Not used specifically, preferring strict uniform grid for tools.

navbar.style: Sticky, minimal height, backdrop-blur-md supports dark/light toggle.

hero.style: Type-driven, centered or left-aligned, massive H1.
hero.content:
Headline: 'ONE PERSON.
AI TOOLS.
NO BULLSHIT.' (or similar vibe). Subtext: 'Building practical AI utilities for builders.'

tools_grid.style: Grid of cards. NO GAPS between cards visually (use -ml-px -mt-px strategy or grid-gap-0 with borders).
tools_grid.card_style: Aspect square or 4:3. Border-r border-b border-border. Hover: bg-accent/5 transition-colors.
tools_grid.badges: Top right corner. Mono font. Small.

build_log.container: bg-black/5 dark:bg-white/5 p-4 font-mono text-sm border border-border
build_log.item_style: flex gap-4 py-2 border-b border-border/50 last:border-0

email_signup.input: rounded-none border-2 border-primary bg-transparent h-12 px-4 focus:ring-0
email_signup.button: rounded-none h-12 px-8 bg-primary text-primary-foreground font-bold hover:bg-accent hover:text-white transition-colors

footer.content: Copyright, Social Links (GitHub, X), 'Built by Luke'.

visual_enhancers.icons: Use Lucide React or Radix Icons. Stroke width 1.5 or 2.
visual_enhancers.motion: Scroll fade-in for sections (opacity 0 -> 1, y 20 -> 0). Duration 0.5s.

universal_guidelines: No rounded corners (use rounded-none or rounded-sm max).
Use 'Space Mono' for all body text.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install fonts: Add import to index.css.
2. Configure Tailwind: Add fonts to tailwind.config.js, extend colors.
3. Build Layout: Sticky Nav + Main Content.
4. Implement Sections: Hero -> Tools Grid -> Build Log -> Signup -> Footer.
6. strictly follow the grid layout for tools - exposed borders are key.
